Package View.Elements

Class ViewPlayer

java.lang.Object
View.Elements.ViewPlayer
public class ViewPlayer extends Object
Class used to provide the Player a graphic representation, with its profile picture CircularImage and its hand with ViewAnimableCard
Author:
Luigi D'Annibale, Daniele Venturini
